Comment: From Bloomberg reporters Tom Schoenberg, Sanjai P R, and Ava Benny-Morrison:  Representatives for Indian billionaire Gautam Adani and his companies met Trump administration officials about dismissing the criminal charges levied against him in an overseas bribery probe, according to people familiar with the matter. Read more [here](https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2025-05-05/adani-camp-meets-trump-officials-in-push-to-end-us-bribery-cases).
Author: bloomberg
